phrases: Are you trying to freeze me to death!?
You cannot ask us to do that.
If we melt it too fast, this whole cave could collapse.
I get it already, so just hurry it up!
I am sure this cold is no good for my skin!
If my beauty is ruined because of this, it would be a serious loss for the universe,
Bulma- san, just a little more.
I thought you were going to keep this from happening!
If you are going to complain, tell us later!
I guess we can relax now.
This is no time to relax!
Vegeta- sama, as powerful as you are, you sure must have had a hard time of it.
As busted up as this high-quality rubber protector is,
I am surprised you came back to us safely.
It would take quite a lot for it to end up like this.
What in the world happened to you on that planet Earth?
He is already gotten tired of this planet, huh?
and that you were to come to the training room when your treatment was finished.
Vegeta- sama... um... you have forgotten your Scouter.
I do not need that thing.
I are not able to control my power at all...
I are not even able to perform the Kaio-ken like this, let alone a Genki Dama.
Say, Bulma- san, do not you think this is a little bit strange?
Is not this where we were before?
It looks like the Dragon Ball is in that lake.
There does not seem to be any doubt.
It has to be inside that stone figure.
Judging by all the other events we have had up to now,
it does not look like this is going to be easy, either.
It would be a relief if Lychee- san or Zarkuro- san were here, huh?
This one out here is going to be a simple affair compared to the others, is not it?
I do not see you going out to get it.
One more, and then Kami- sama and Piccolo can both come back to life.
And once that happens, the Dragon Balls will be restored,
and we can return to Earth,
and bring Yamucha, Tenshinhan and everyone back to life, cannot we?
Then we can all go back to our regular lives, and Earth will be at peace, will not it?
Then I can put some makeup on, and go back to being the usual beauty that I am, cannot I?
Do not you boys forget that you are on a mission to save Earth.
One more, and then Piccolo-san will come back to life!
Geez, this is no time to be playing around, Gohan- kun!
It is like I am being held by an incredible power!
What was Goku- sa doing in a place like this?
D- do not tell me he was training in his condition...
l'll head for Earth first thing in the morning.
l'm going to smash them to pieces for sure this time.
No, before that, l'll go to Planet Namek...
I heard you had yourself a rough time of it.
They said that both Raditz and Nappa died.
To whom do the supposedly invincible Saiyans owe the pleasure of this grief?
I do not have time to entertain your inconsequential chitchat.
Freeza- sama is cross with you for the actions you guys took without his permission.
He cannot complain about it if he is not here.
remove that filthy hand of yours.
Still, Freeza- sama is a magnanimous gentleman.
I hear he is going to forgive you.
That is because you have discovered something wonderful.
He was thrilled when he found out he might be able to gain eternal youth and life.
Then, the place that Freeza- sama departed for is-?
He listened in on our conversation over the Scouters, huh?
l - l have to beat him to it somehow, or l'll be that bastard's toady forever!
I understand that you wanted those Dragon Ball things to gain eternal life too,
but you will have to give that up now.
Once Freeza- sama has his wish granted, he is planning to exterminate the Namekians.
It turns out I need it after all!
I will not let you do this!
If you try anything perverted, you are going to answer for it!
We are through playing around now.
You are just now realizing it?
Are you sure you should not be rescuing him?
He will be eaten if you leave him there.
This world is not Planet Namek?
And who is this Freeza that even Vegeta is afraid of?
